definitions.title: n.pr.gent.
definitions.body: an ancient trans-Jordanic people, dwelling in [[הָם]] Ge 14:5; otherwise unknown; abode appar. in (later) land of Ammon, between Bashan and Moab; commonly supposed = [[זַמְזֻמִּים]] q.v., in that case perh. txt. error in one case or the other, cf. Nö:Untersuchungen z. Kritik d. A. T. 162.—(LXX e)/qnh i)sxura/).—On n.pr.loc. Ziza, zyz0, between Boṣra and Lejûn, cf. Kn Di ad loc., Tristr:Moab 182 ff.
